input.sentences: a fundraiser was being held | and all of the famous radio dj from 98.1 chfi came .
the night was great | with plenty of entertainment from the radio crew .
it was time though to announce the total amount donated from the fundraiser .

output.sentences: The group went to a costume party together.
The costume party had a 70s theme.
The costume party selected the winner of the costume party.
The costume party was also a charity party.
The costume charity presented a check to help children.
